1.title: Loving Life on Lake Lanier
1.plot: After moving to Lake Lanier, Georgia, a family searches for a boat to access the lake's waterfront restaurants and one-of-a-kind water park. Can they find a boat that is fast and roomy enough for this family of four?

2.title: New Life in Panama City Beach
2.plot: After trading New Hampshire winters for Florida sunshine, a family realizes they need to buy a boat to take advantage of all that Panama City Beach has to offer, from dolphin watching to island hopping.

3.title: Loving Lake Lewisville
3.plot: An adventurous family can't wait to own their own boat. They weigh their options as they test drive boats and enjoy waterfront activities on Lake Lewisville, one of the largest lakes in north Texas.

4.title: Wilmington's Waterways
4.plot: A family of three needs to buy a boat to fully enjoy the various waterways surrounding Wilmington, NC. While test driving many different boat styles, they explore the beautiful oceanfront beaches and historic Riverwalk district.

5.title: Boating Back in Time
5.plot: A Michigan family lives on beautiful Mackinac Island. In order to fully enjoy all the waterfront activity this historical resort area has to offer, they go shopping for a boat fit for their fun family of four.

6.title: Fun in the Florida Keys
6.plot: A family of four shops for a boat in the beautiful blue waters surrounding the Florida Keys. They live in the northernmost island, Key Largo, and enjoy many water activities. Now they are ready for a boat of their own!

7.title: Boatless in Seattle
7.plot: A young Seattle couple is on the market for a boat. From the world's first hot tub boat to pre-football game sail-gating, they explore the unique urban area while searching for the perfect pleasure boat.

8.title: Living It Up on Lake Erie
8.plot: An Ohio family living on Lake Erie looks for a boat to fully enjoy all the lake has to offer. From historical monuments to dog-friendly beaches, they explore the vast lake during their search for a boat fit for their family.

9.title: Melbourne Beach Boaters
9.plot: A family of six loves to be on the water, so it's time to buy a boat. While enjoying airboat rides and sand bars along the east coast of Florida, they test out different boats that might be a fit for this fun family.

10.title: Lake of the Ozarks
10.plot: A family lives on the Lake of the Ozarks in central Missouri. They explore the unique area known for its beautiful caves, awesome state parks and tons of water activities while shopping for just the right boat.

11.title: Big Boat on the Bay
11.plot: A couple from Annapolis, MD, is searching for a luxury boat fit for their overnight trips across the Chesapeake Bay. They enjoy the rich maritime history of the area while looking at upscale boats with amazing cabins.

12.title: Vessels in Vermont
12.plot: A young family loves exploring all the fun outdoor attractions surrounding their lakeside town of Colchester, Vermont. While shopping for a versatile family boat, they enjoy both the New York and Vermont sides of Lake Champlain.

13.title: New Boat on Norman
13.plot: A family of four loves living on North Carolina's Lake Norman and want a boat to enjoy the family-friendly activities the lake offers. Between waterfront mini-golf and relaxing fishing trips, the family tests out different boats.

14.title: Tampa Bay Getaway
14.plot: A couple lives in Tampa, FL, and love to take their two kids out to enjoy the many waterfront attractions and awesome fishing spots around Tampa Bay. They're shopping for just the right boat for their fun family fishing trips.

15.title: Smooth Sailing in Texas
15.plot: An adventurous couple is looking to buy a large boat to live on during extended trips around the Gulf Coast area of Galveston, TX. They go kayaking and zip lining along the waterfront as they shop for the boat of their dreams.

16.title: Slip Away to Saginaw Bay
16.plot: A couple loves spending time with their family on the vast waters of Saginaw Bay, MI. They enjoy local activities with their many grandchildren as they go shopping for a large, comfortable boat of their own.

imdb.title: Boat Buyers
plot: Adventurous families go on wild hunts for their dream boats, exploring new destinations and fun water activities along the way.
